a comment on index regist alloc a techniqu is presentto reduc the enumer requir by a known procedur foroptim index regist alloc in straight line program thi techniquis base on the construct of a link diagram whichshow at ani step the futur occurr of index whichmust be load into index regist thi diagram determin inadvanc the requir regist configur at certain step of theprogram so that the program is subdivid into separ portionto which the alloc procedur mai be appli independ cacmseptemb 1967 luccio f ca670909 jb februari 27 1978 306 pm 1535 5 1535 1535 5 1535 1535 51535 1781 5 1535 2579 5 1535 123 6 1535196 6 1535 919 6 1535 990 6 1535 10076 1535 1046 6 1535 1131 6 1535 1139 61535 1140 6 1535 1149 6 1535 1198 6 15351215 6 1535 1223 6 1535 1265 6 1535 13036 1535 1323 6 1535 1358 6 1535 1366 61535 1421 6 1535 1460 6 1535 1462 6 15351463 6 1535 1467 6 1535 1468 6 1535 14776 1535 1491 6 1535 1496 6 1535 1531 61535 1535 6 1535 1535 6 1535 1565 6 15351601 6 1535 1602 6 1535 1613 6 1535 16146 1535 1626 6 1535 1641 6 1535 1787 61535 1788 6 1535 1807 6 1535 205 6 1535224 6 1535 249 6 1535 288 6 1535 19476 1535 316 6 1535 381 6 1535 398 61535 11 6 1535 404 6 1535 410 6 1535463 6 1535 464 6 1535 483 6 1535 31846 1535 3188 6 1535 584 6 1535 600 61535 680 6 1535 691 6 1535 763 6 1535799 6 1535
